metadata.name: Reunion
metadata.description:
Photo: 8 000 х 5 323 px

I've been walking alone for so long I'm used to it.
Only the rustle of leaves underneath my feet. 
I am misguided, misunderstood, cold - 
Like a soft clay leaking from a broken mold. 

I shall be strong enough to wander until the end of time.
Will another soul be ever by the side of mine? 
In this deafening silence the night has come 
I’m striving to cry but my heart is numb.

We sometimes don’t see who has long been lost
And cannot return to the place our paths had crossed.
Loneliness hovers above like a bird of prey
To destroy me when I surrender to the dismay…

(by AlkudNFT)

P.S. This is my first poem in English so please don't judge it strictly :)
